Author: Real_CryptoRoy
Review: Usually I agree with your analysis but can't agree on this one. 54% correction? It's kinda too much at this point. Maybe in 2026 yes but not now. Moreover, after the halving BTC price dropping below 40k is basically impossible due to the cost of mining. Throughout of the history of Bitcoin this was one of the most reliable indicator to understand possible lowest price. If I'm not mistaken at the moment cost of mining of 1 Bitcoin seats at around 45k-50k, so I don't think that price can drop below that level.

Author: madoperator
Review: your point is well taken but: 1. NOTHING is "basically impossible" in any market no matter how much capital is locked in red. 2. At the same time, technicals mean nothing to the consumers buying and selling but are latent numerical phenomena. What I mean is consumers en masse are motivated by other factors. 3. People are a little too comfortable at this price point in my humble opinion, which can easily be shaken. 4. I think it is wise to look for indirect evidence in other markets like stocks and treasuries and dollar index. 5. The ascending triangle is a continuation pattern. 6. CryptoRoy, miners don't buy but they do sell equipment, the reason is because HODLers are also ready at the defense at those levels. HODLers aren't traditional market participants, we had BTC when it was $100, we will hold it all at 0 and give just as many fks. Why? Because we prefer it over holding the dollar.

Author: woutergelaude2
Review: I think xanrox concluded a while ago that according to his analysis and not changing market conditions the price would rise untill 100K. That analysis is still correct and I believe 100k will be reached but on the way towards it, we will face some bear markets caused by changing circumstances which xanrox could not take in account for his analysis. For example: war, some idiot like Powell that said something stupid or negative, acceptance of the new European crypto low (which forbids stablecoins for the most part such as usdt. Csdc is allowed and acknowledged. But many others are not. This will olso have some influence. So I can find Me in xanrox analysis that at this moment cards changed and we will go bearish for a while untill market is stabilised and ready to rise again. And then I can follow xanrox that a price of 100K is possible. Besides, what are the chances companies Like Blackrock would set up and invest in their own bitcoin ETF without the certainty that they will earn 10x more on it? I guess small. No?

Author: Khosroparviz
Review: Your analysis is excellent, and I always follow you. But the interesting thing is that we have a strong cloud support at 42000 based on Residual Ichimoku Cloud method in the daily time frame, which will definitely turn into the strongest uptrend support after hitting it, which is around $71,000. Secondly, the weekly trend line passes around 42000, and it seems to me that this point will be the best point for a reversal, almost around the 50% Fibonacci level and not 61.8, which can be considered as a reversal point right from there. Of course, I have benefited from the Residual Ichimoku Cloud method from weekly to 15min timeframes and seen its accuracy. But I don't know how accurate your Elliott Wave analysis compares to my method, which your method is likely more engineering-oriented. Goodluck.

Author: AlanSantana
Review: Questions and Answers:1)Question: According to many YouTubers, Bitcoin is people's money and is supposed to take away power from banks and potentially end the era of central banks and their money printing. Answer:This is incorrect. Bitcoin has full support from banks. In 2024, a lot of Bitcoin ETFs were launched. One of them is the ETF from BlackRock. With their power, they can make a 51% attack on Bitcoin and get rid of it.

Author: AlanSantana
Review: 2)Question: The conspiracists shockingly believe that bitcoin is part of a ‚Äúfinal beast system,‚Äù which is taking over the world through hard infrastructure.  Answer: Bitcoin is the next money into a purely cashless, digital form. Combined with biometrics, it creates the necessary technological infrastructure for a one world cashless ID, otherwise known as the mark of the beast, which AI will use for complete economic surveillance and control over the human race. 1 wallet per 1 person, monitored 24/7, limited spending power and suspended anytime by government. Is that what you want?

Author: AlanSantana
Review: 3)Question: Would crypto currencies like bitcoin or ethereum be part of the AI future? Answer: Yes, smart contracts and blockchain have a great use case in AI.

Author: AlanSantana
Review: 4)Question: Did the CIA or NSA create Bitcoin? Answer: Yes. Bitcoin was created by a shadow government. One of the reasons is to eliminate cash on the planet. The banking system is in trouble because people are starting to wake up (not fast enough, though) to the fact that it is all funny money. So they developed Bitcoin, which sounds just great and pulls in all the people who are waking up. We all know that the shadow government has technology that is not available to the public. Some people say they may be 50 or 100 years ahead, and they already used AI systems decades ago before they released them to the public.

Author: AlanSantana
Review: 5)Question: What AI technology we use today? Answer: This AI technology is not new. It's not created by humans. It's part of a huge Galactic AI system that is in existence for a very long time, more than you can imagine. This technology was bringed to this planet by unspecified entitites.

Author: AlanSantana
Review: 6)Question: What is required for AI to run? Answer: It required electricity, microchips, computers, internet. The whole infrastructure that was build on Earth in past 100 years was one of the reasons to implement AI.

Author: AlanSantana
Review: 7)Question: How may future look with AI? Answer: Elon Musk already developing Neuralink, which is an interface to connect your brain into an AI cloud system. That means your thoughts that you have will not be yours, but will come from the AI systems. AI will tell you what you will eat, what sport you will play or what you will do during the day. This is of course part of the transformation process from organic human to a cyborg. We all know that modern technology such as wifi, bluetooth or electronic devices are not healthy and causing anxiety and depression. Human body is entirely not compatible with this technology. It breaks the highest natural law of life. Anyone who consciously support this is basically jumping into a boiling water.

Author: Ether2020
Review: Before diving into the 2025 prediction, it's worth considering some of the key patterns we're seeing, like the Cup and Handle, Head and Shoulders, and expanding bull flags. These patterns often indicate bullish potential, which could suggest upward movement rather than a drop. These patterns are big, so it will have also a big impact. Now, regarding 2025 and the idea of a bloodbath, I'm curious why you think that might happen. There are several important factors that might suggest otherwise. For one, the Bitcoin halving already happened in April, and we’re likely to see the effects of that soon. Historically, halvings have led to significant price increases. Plus, the limited number of Bitcoins left to mine acts as a catalyst, potentially driving prices up even further.

Author: Ether2020
Review: thanks for the idea! Looks like BTC broke the bearish rising wedge, so we might see a retest of the trend line or head towards the target. The main targets for BTC on the weekly are still holding strong, and I’m expecting it to start lifting after September.   The more sideways action we see, the stronger the breakout could be, and I think shorters might face a short squeeze in the coming weeks. That’s why, in my opinion, staying in a stablecoin is a better move than shorting right now.

Author: MyCryptoParadise_Simon
Review: your analysis really captures the tug of war between buyers and sellers around these key levels btc has certainly been in a rollercoaster mode with the initial upward momentum last week giving bulls a brief sense of control before the bears started to tighten their grip especially as we saw btc dip below the 200-day and 50-day SMAs. with the current bearish sentiment it looks like the sellers have managed to create a bit of a ceiling around the 64000 level for now and as you mentioned september is traditionally a challenging month for btc historically so that could play into further downside pressure if sellers keep the upper hand a drop to the 58000 support level could certainly be in play

Author: MyCryptoParadise_Simon
Review: interesting to see the price action around that 59000 level after the more than 6 percent drop the recent dip definitely shook things up but as you said there might be a brighter outlook ahead with bullish market conditions potentially forming in the next 24 hours. I like the tactical idea from 10xResearch entering around 59000 with a tight stop at 58000 does seem like a prudent move especially in a market that is still lacking a clear bullish trend catching a tactical rally is often about timing and precision and this setup could offer a decent risk reward opportunity for those looking to capitalize on any short term rebound, it is also fascinating to see the continued growth in the number of bitcoin millionaires and those few holding over a billion dollars despite the market's volatility it just goes to show how much capital continues to flow into the crypto space even when conditions are not always ideal a bit of sun shining on bitcoin always tends to attract more eyes
